verses.verse: In the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> it.

And in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> was broken <S%H1234>up.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> even <S%H5371>Nergal-sharezer,<s%> <S%H5562>Samgar-nebo,<s%> <S%H8310>Sarsechim,<s%> <S%H7249>Rabsaris,<s%> <S%H5371>Nergal-sharezer,<s%> <S%H7248>Rab-mag,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> then they <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1588>garden,<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the two <S%H2346>walls:<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain.<s%>

But the <S%H3778>Chaldeans'<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, and <S%H5381>overtook<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> and when they had <S%H3947>taken<s%> him, they brought him <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H7247>Riblah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> where he <S%H1696>gave<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H854>upon<s%> him.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> in <S%H7247>Riblah<s%> before his <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> also the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
Moreover he put <S%H5786>out<s%> <S%H6677>Zedekiah's<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with <S%H5178>chains,<s%> to <S%H935>carry<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon<s%> the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7604>remained<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and those that fell <S%H5307>away,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> him, <S%H853>with<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7604>remained.<s%>

But <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H369>nothing,<s%> <S%H3972><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H3010>fields<s%> at the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>time.<s%>

Now <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> gave <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> him, and look <S%H5869>well<s%> <S%H7760><s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> him, and <S%H6213>do<s%> him <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3972><s%> <S%H7451>harm;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> him <S%H3651>even<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he shall <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

So <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H5021>Nebushasban,<s%> <S%H7249>Rabsaris,<s%> and <S%H5371>Nergal-sharezer,<s%> <S%H7248>Rab-mag,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H7227>princes;<s%>

Even they <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> out of the <S%H4480>court<s%> <S%H2691><s%> of the <S%H4307>prison,<s%> and <S%H5414>committed<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> that he should <S%H3318>carry<s%> him <S%H1004>home:<s%> so he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> while he <S%H1961>was<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H5663>Ebed-melech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> for <S%H2896>good;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> accomplished in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.

But I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H3016>afraid.<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I will surely <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H4422><s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> but thy <S%H5315>life<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H7998>prey<s%> unto thee: <S%H3588>because<s%> thou hast put thy <S%H982>trust<s%> in me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
